```{r}
df <- read.csv("Data/Medicaldataset.csv")
head(df)
```

```{r}
names(df)
summary(df)
```

```{r}
df$Result <- as.factor(df$Result)
summary(df)
```

```{r}
library(corrplot)
library(knitr)
library(PerformanceAnalytics)
kable(cor(df[, -9]))
chart.Correlation(df[, -9])
```

```{r}
df$Result <- ifelse(df$Result == "positive", 1, 0)
head(df)
```

```{r}
df <- df[df$Heart.rate != 1111, ]
head(df)
```

```{r}
chart.Correlation(df)
```

```{r}
tail(df[df$CK.MB>=300, ])
```

```{r}
model <- glm(Result~., family = 'binomial', data = df[, -c(3:5)])
summary(model)
```

```{r}
probs <- predict(model, newdata = df[, -c(3:5)], type = "response")
pred <- rep(0, length(probs))
pred[probs > .5] <- 1

table(pred, df$Result)
```
